name: Personal Statistics for Authors
author: Agence Peexeo

sections.description: Personnal Statistics for Authors is the plugin required for every blog. It uses the Facebook, Twitter and Google Analytics API to get the data of your posts (shares, tweets, keywords used to find it, visits from smartphones, bounce rate…). You don’t need to switch between your Analytics dashboard and everything else : PSfA is here to do that job for you.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘personnal-statistics-for-authors’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Personnal Statistics for Authors’ under the ‘Settings’ tab and configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixes bugs when adding and removing posts and display latest update date for a post
